articles.author: ANNE D'INNOCENZIO
articles.title: Retail sales fall 0.8% in January from December as shoppers pause after strong holiday season - The Associated Press
articles.description: Americans pulled back their spending in January after splurging during the holiday season. Retail sales fell 0.8% from the strong pace in December when retail sales were up a revised 0.4%, according to the Commerce Department. The decline was bigger than the …
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Americans pulled back their spending more than expected in January after the traditional holiday season splurge.
Retail sales fell 0.8% in January from the strong pace in December when… [+5005 chars]
